title: Gordon the High Speed Engine
description: Gordon wasn't satisfied with being 'the big engine'- he wanted to be the fastest engine as well. When he heard that the other railway had diesels which ran at 125 miles an hour, he thought he could travel even faster than that. Gordon tried hard, but mostly seemed to be in trouble until one day the high-speed Train broke down...31.1 High-Speed Gordon31.2 Smokescreen31.3 Fire Escape31.4 Gordon Proves His Point
author: Christopher Awdry
